title: thefall
body:
<<moveDown Renata 20 80>>
Renata: Ouch!
<<moveUp Renata 5 40>>
<<moveDown Renata 5 40>>
<<unhide Mia>>
<<moveDown Mia 20 80>>
Mia: Ouch!
<<moveUp Mia 5 40>>
<<moveDown Mia 5 40>>
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<coupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
[[wherearewe]]

title: wherearewe
body:
<<pauseFor Mia 1.0>>
<<faceRight Mia>>
<<faceLeft Renata>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1.0>>
<<faceUp Mia>>
<<faceDown Renata>>
Mia: Where are we?????
Renata: ...I think we're in the ruins.
Mia-miaangryface: Is there any way out? Are we stuck here?
Renata: Don't worry, we'll find a way out! Let's get looking
[[cleanup]]
